mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEAT WHERE S_P_ID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEAT(S_P_ID , S_ID , S_STATE , S_NORESERCE) VALUES(#{p_id},#{s_id},#{s_state},#{s_noreserve})
mapper.select: SELECT S_P_ID AS P_ID, S_ID, S_STATE, S_SPEC, S_NORESERVE FROM SEAT WHERE S_P_ID = #{ID} ORDER BY S_ID ASC
